CustomField.description: Do sales of this product contribute to Recurring or One-time revenue?
CustomField.formula: CASE( Product_Type__c , "Services", "One-time", "Services Discount", "One-time", "Software Discount (Recurring)","Recurring", "Software Discount (One-Time)","One-time", "Maintenance", "Recurring", "Support", "Recurring", "Software", CASE( Product_License_Type__c, "Annual", "Recurring", "Monthly", "Recurring", "Perpetual", "One-time", "Early Adopter","One-time", NULL), "Discount", CASE( Discount_Type__c , "Recurring", "Recurring", "One-time", "One-time", NULL), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do sales of this product contribute to Recurring or One-time revenue?
CustomField.label: Product Revenue Type
